results.title: Pharmacologic ACE-Inhibition Mitigates Radiation-Induced Pneumonitis by Suppressing ACE-Expressing Lung Myeloid Cells.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: Mitigation of @DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pneumonia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pneumonitis@@@ with the @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE-@@@inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was evaluated in the 13.5 Gy @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ partial body irradiation model.

results.title: Cardiac Remodeling and Reversible Pulmonary Hypertension During Pneumonitis in Rats after 13-Gy Partial-Body Irradiation with Minimal Bone Marrow Sparing: Effect of Lisinopril.
